attributes.action: Ban products containing Ethylene glycerol (Mainly Antifreeze)
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition and lets get this toxic substance banned as people use this to poison animals on purpose to get rid of them and nobody notices and people get away with it, 2 of my cats have died from this and 1 of my next door neighbours cat did as well so please sign this!
attributes.background:
Ethylene glycerol is a toxic chemical that is used mainly in anti freeze products.
These products are toxic to animals and can kill in less than 12 hours.  9 months ago my cat drank antifreeze and died and recently my 6 month old kitten had to be put to sleep as he had antifreeze poisoning as well.
